00011 typedef enum rpmtdFlags_e {
00012     RPMTD_NONE          = 0,
00013     RPMTD_ALLOCED       = (1 << 0),     /* was memory allocated? */
00014     RPMTD_PTR_ALLOCED   = (1 << 1),     /* were array pointers allocated? */
00015     RPMTD_IMMUTABLE     = (1 << 2),     /* header data or modifiable? */
00016 } rpmtdFlags;

00022 struct rpmtd_s {
00023     rpmTag tag;         /* rpm tag of this data entry*/
00024     rpmTagType type;    /* data type */
00025     rpm_count_t count;  /* number of entries */
00026     rpm_data_t data;    /* pointer to actual data */
00027     rpmtdFlags flags;   /* flags on memory allocation etc */
00028     int ix;             /* iteration index */
00029 };

00199 typedef enum rpmtdFormats_e {
00200     RPMTD_FORMAT_STRING         = 0,    /* plain string (any type) */
00201     RPMTD_FORMAT_ARMOR          = 1,    /* ascii armor format (bin types) */
00202     RPMTD_FORMAT_BASE64         = 2,    /* base64 encoding (bin types) */
00203     RPMTD_FORMAT_PGPSIG         = 3,    /* pgp/gpg signature (bin types) */
00204     RPMTD_FORMAT_DEPFLAGS       = 4,    /* dependency flags (int32 types) */
00205     RPMTD_FORMAT_FFLAGS         = 5,    /* file flags (int32 types) */
00206     RPMTD_FORMAT_PERMS          = 6,    /* permission string (int32 types) */
00207     RPMTD_FORMAT_TRIGGERTYPE    = 7,    /* trigger types */
00208     RPMTD_FORMAT_XML            = 8,    /* xml format (any type) */
00209     RPMTD_FORMAT_OCTAL          = 9,    /* octal format (int32 types) */
00210     RPMTD_FORMAT_HEX            = 10,   /* hex format (int32 types) */
00211     RPMTD_FORMAT_DATE           = 11,   /* date format (int32 types) */
00212     RPMTD_FORMAT_DAY            = 12,   /* day format (int32 types) */
00213     RPMTD_FORMAT_SHESCAPE       = 13,   /* shell escaped (any type) */
00214     RPMTD_FORMAT_ARRAYSIZE      = 14,   /* size of contained array (any type) */
00215 } rpmtdFormats;

00333 /* \ingroup rpmtd
00334  * Perform deep copy of container.
00335  * Create a modifiable copy of tag data container (on string arrays each
00336  * string is separately allocated)
00337  * @todo                Only string arrays types are supported currently
00338  * @param td            Container to copy
00339  * @return              New container or NULL on error
00340  */
